<onlyinclude>
** {{nbt|compound|minecraft:swing_animation|}}: Allows modification of the swinging animation.
*** {{nbt|string|type}}: The type of swinging animation. Can be {{cd|none}}, {{cd|whack}}, {{cd|stab}}. Defaults to {{cd|whack}}.
*** {{nbt|int|duration}}: A positive integer that determines the animation's duration in [[tick]]s. Defaults to {{cd|6}}.
</onlyinclude>
